title: Racing Exotics Like a Gentleman: Aston Martin's Vantage GT4 Race Car - /TUNED
description: Tuned goes to Sonoma Raceway in Northern California on an invite from TRG Motorsports, who have begun campaigning their new Aston Martin GT4 race cars. We get some hot laps around Sonoma and find out how wonderful it is to drive the racing version of one of our favorite Exotics.
